name: Water deck 2
author: jadencrios
notes: I was mildly struggling on my climb with different decks. I couldn't figure out why, the deck lists were good even with my modifications. I then came up with this deck. I can't believe how original it was and how no one else uses it. Only 1 loss from L1-KoG. A lot of Sylvan players... do they not know that deck is trash?
